channel.description: when you change starting place how do you transfer the portals from the old starting place and some objects and the shops please help i wanna change my starting p lace but i cant unless somone helps me (thanks) :) lol i got toxicscape source if that make ant diffrence at all

Read full topic

item.title: Need help changing starting place!
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

To change where every player starts, its found in player.java. Just search your starting coords in there, then replace them with your new ones. To change where some of the portals are located, go to client.java. Search for makeglobalobject or addglobalobject. You will see something like (2243,3453,382,-1,10). The 2243,3453 is where the object is located, the 382 is the id of the object, and the -1,10 is the direction of the object(you wont need to worry about this with portals. To change where some of the npcâ€™s are is you go to autospawn.cfg and you will easy see how to do it. I think its like npcid = 58 6353 2353 then alot more. Just edit the 6353 2353 to your new coords.

Read full topic
